title: Most popular Canadian product categories purchased by consumers in Canada 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Food and lowest at Response Wine.
The highest Response Food has 53.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Wine.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Food and lowest at Response Wine.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Food and lowest at Response Wine.
The highest Response Food has 53.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Wine.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 87.0 is found at Response Food and the minimum is found at Wine where Response is 34.0.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response Beer.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 53.0.
Share of respondents at Response Food is 87.0 , second place is Beer at 46.0, and thirdly is Clothing at 45.0.
The average Share of respondents in all 5 Responses is 50.0.
